column5: Can anyone direct me to an updated website that has Forbidden items bringing into Canada? I have looked at one and it still says you dont need a passport to cross the border.

Technically you don't need a passport to enter into Canada, but one is required to re-enter the US, so the website you are looking at might be up to date. When we crossed into Canada last year at Fort Francis they wanted passports, for ID's, and one of our party had it packed away. The guard insisted he dig it out as she wanted to see what he was going to use to re-enter the US.
Bring as passport everytime you cross, no matter what! Not needed going into Canada, by going into the US, it's required
you may also find this website useful: www.keepwisconsinknuckleheadsout.com
Thanks, this all helps. You guys are great.
Try the cbsa.gc.ca (Canadian Border Services Agency) website and use their Contact Us function. Pose your question and they will e-mail you an answer.
